alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Showers capable of producing funnel clouds will affect western Putnam and central Bureau Counties... At 743 PM CDT...showers capable of producing funnel clouds were located over Hennepin, or over Princeton...MOVING southwest AT 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Princeton, Hennepin, DePue, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, Buda, Bureau Junction, Putnam, Malden, Dover, Hollowayville, Providence, Coal Hollow, Zearing, Kasbeer, Lake Thunderbird and Bureau County Fairgrounds. Funnel clouds of this nature are short lived and rarely touch the ground. However, if you notice one approaching the ground, move indoors to a place of safety. The National Weather Service will continue to closely monitor the situation. Please forward reports of funnel cloud sightings to the nearest law enforcement agency for relay to the National Weather Service.
